verses.verse: הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> hal-lu- Praise יָ֡הּ <S%H3050><s%> yah ye the LORD הַלְלִ֥י <S%H1984><s%> hal-Li Praise נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi, O my soul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

אֲהַלְלָ֣ה <S%H1984><s%> 'a-hal-Lah will I praise יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD בְּחַיָּ֑י <S%H2416><s%> be-chai-Yai; While I live אֲזַמְּרָ֖ה <S%H2167><s%> 'a-zam-me-Rah I will sing praises לֵֽאלֹהַ֣י <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Hai unto my God בְּעוֹדִֽי׃ <S%H5750><s%> be-'o-Di. while

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּבְטְח֥וּ <S%H982><s%> tiv-te-Chu Put not your trust בִנְדִיבִ֑ים <S%H5081><s%> vin-di-Vim; in princes בְּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> be-ven- [nor] in the son אָדָ֓ם׀ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man שֶׁ֤אֵֽין <S%H369><s%> She-'ein there ל֥וֹ lo תְשׁוּעָֽה׃ <S%H8668><s%> te-shu-'Ah. in whom [there is] no help

תֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> te-Tze goeth forth ר֭וּחוֹ <S%H7307><s%> ru-cho His breath יָשֻׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shuv he returneth לְאַדְמָת֑וֹ <S%H127><s%> le-'ad-ma-To; to his earth בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom in that very day הַ֝ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he אָבְד֥וּ <S%H6><s%> 'a-ve-Du perish עֶשְׁתֹּנֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H6250><s%> 'esh-to-no-Tav. his thoughts

אַשְׁרֵ֗י <S%H835><s%> 'ash-Rei, Happy שֶׁ֤אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> she-'El [is he] that [hath] the God יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob בְּעֶזְר֑וֹ <S%H5828><s%> be-'ez-Ro; for his help שִׂ֝בְר֗וֹ <S%H7664><s%> ve-Ro, whose hope עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is in יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [is] in the LORD אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hav. his God

עֹשֶׂ֤ה׀ <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh Which made שָׁ֘מַ֤יִם <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim heaven וָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> va-'A-retz, and earth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיָּ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam the sea וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after בָּ֑ם Bam; הַשֹּׁמֵ֖ר <S%H8104><s%> hash-sho-Mer and all that therein [is] which keepeth אֱמֶ֣ת <S%H571><s%> 'e-Met truth לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam. for ever

עֹשֶׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh Which executeth מִשְׁפָּ֨ט׀ <S%H4941><s%> mish-Pat judgment לָעֲשׁוּקִ֗ים <S%H6231><s%> la-'a-shu-Kim, for the oppressed נֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten which giveth לֶ֭חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem food לָרְעֵבִ֑ים <S%H7457><s%> la-re-'e-Vim; to the hungry יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD מַתִּ֥יר <S%H5425><s%> mat-Tir looseth אֲסוּרִֽים׃ <S%H631><s%> 'a-su-Rim. the prisoners

יְהוָ֤ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD פֹּ֘קֵ֤חַ <S%H6491><s%> po-Ke-ach openeth עִוְרִ֗ים <S%H5787><s%> 'iv-Rim, [the eyes of] the blind יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD זֹקֵ֣ף <S%H2210><s%> zo-Kef raiseth כְּפוּפִ֑ים <S%H3721><s%> ke-fu-Fim; them that are bowed down יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֹהֵ֥ב <S%H157><s%> 'o-Hev loveth צַדִּיקִֽים׃ <S%H6662><s%> tzad-di-Kim. the righteous

יְהוָ֤ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD שֹׁ֘מֵ֤ר <S%H8104><s%> sho-Mer preserveth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- גֵּרִ֗ים <S%H1616><s%> ge-Rim, the strangers יָת֣וֹם <S%H3490><s%> ya-Tom the fatherless וְאַלְמָנָ֣ה <S%H490><s%> ve-'al-ma-Nah and widow יְעוֹדֵ֑ד <S%H5749><s%> ye-'o-Ded; he relieveth וְדֶ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> ve-De-rech but the way רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im of the wicked יְעַוֵּֽת׃ <S%H5791><s%> ye-'av-Vet. he turneth upside down

יִמְלֹ֤ךְ <S%H4427><s%> yim-Loch shall reign יְהוָ֨ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD לְעוֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam, for ever אֱלֹהַ֣יִךְ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Ha-yich [even] thy God צִ֭יּוֹן <S%H6726><s%> Tzi-yon O Zion לְדֹ֥ר <S%H1755><s%> le-Dor unto all וָדֹ֗ר <S%H1755><s%> va-Dor, generations הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> hal-lu- Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> Yah. ye the LORD
